name: Trans Lifeline
description: Trans Lifeline is a grassroots hotline and microgrants 501(c)(3) non-profit organization offering direct emotional and financial support to trans people in crisis. They provide trans peer support that has been divested from police since day one, run by and for trans people. Services include crisis intervention, emotional support, safety planning, and microgrants for trans individuals. They operate on principles of peer support, community (not cops), harm reduction, confidentiality, and structural rather than pathological approaches.
source: Verified from official Trans Lifeline website
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
notes: EIN: 47-2097494. Spanish language support available at https://translifeline.org/es/. They have answered over 150,000 calls and dispersed nearly $1.5 million in microgrants. Over 600 operators trained. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TransLifeline/, Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/translifeline/, TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@translifeline/. Additional resource: Hey I'm Trans at https://heyimtrans.com/ for coming out support.
